snippet: Perhaps the first sign of the historic number of women gracing the 113th Congress came at 10:45 Thursday morning, when female members of the House Democratic caucus gathered on the House steps for a group photo.
abstract: Perhaps the first sign of the historic number of women gracing the 113th Congress came at 10:45 Thursday morning, when female members of the House Democratic caucus gathered on the House steps for a group photo.

headline.main: A Snapshot of the Growing Ranks of Women in Congress
